projects.title: react-redux-webaudio
projects.shortDescription: A WIP for easy integration of the Web Audio API with a React-Redux app.
description: A package that provides an easy and intuitive way to create sounds in a React-Redux app
200+ downloads within the first week of the beta release

projects.title: The Sound of Tweets
projects.shortDescription: Exploring the representation of data with sound.
description: An experimental data-sonification engine built into a React-Redux app
Utilizes the Twitter API and IBM-Watson Tone Analyzer to collect and analyze data
Data is passed client-side with socket.io where sound is generated with the Web Audio API

projects.title: Youphonic
projects.shortDescription: A playground for creating musical compositions through a physical-based environment.
description: An online musical machine building interface where users make soundscapes and musical compositions using abstract shapes that interact in a physical-based environment
Node.js backend server built using Express and PostgreSQL with Sequelize ORM for the database
Frontend built with Paper.js and integrated with React-Redux through a custom React-Paper.js wrapper component
Built a custom physics engine
Designed sounds using Tone.js
